doc.title: Little Miss Bluebonnet
doc.plot: P S McGeeney, Sr, my grandfather, was hired by the San Antonio Chamber of Commerce to make a movie about the benefits of coming to San Antonio, TX Sinced the Bluebonnett was the flower of Texas/San Antonio my grandfather picked than as the story line. A charming girl would visit the good things about San Antonio. Blance McGarity was the local girl who visited various San Antonio sites. Baseball with Babe Ruth, they practice here and the Military Ball with Gen John Hines, future chief of staff of the Army. She became Little Miss Bluebonnett and takes the viewers on a tour of the city.
